subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks’ Amar’e Stoudemire received a reprieve from the N.B.A. for a third time this season. His next technical will result in a one-game suspension.
snippet: The Knicks’ Amar’e Stoudemire received a reprieve from the N.B.A. for a third time this season. His next technical will result in a one-game suspension.
